agency_name: LOVE NEVER FAILS UNITED CHRISTIAN CHURCH
agency_desc: A church with worship services and charitable outreach, including support groups and recovery services.
service_description: Provides a faith-based program to help those struggling from alcohol and drug addiction and other issues such as co-dependence, depression, and anxiety.
site_details: Walk in. -- Send an email or call for information
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides services to those who have been victims of crime.
service_description: Provides advocacy services for victims of any crime. Gives victims the opportunity to complete a Victim Impact Statement to submit to prosecutors prior to sentencing or plea negotiations. Additional assistance provided to victims in the filing of protective orders, court accompaniment, crisis intervention, case management, protective order assistance, and mobile advocacy. Special emphasis placed on victims of domestic violence and/or sexual assault. Services may include safety planning and help applying for victims compensation benefits.
site_details: Call for information.
site_eligibility:
○Living in Orange County 
○Victims of any crime

agency_desc: A natural gas service provider.
service_description: Provides natural gas utility services.
site_details: Call or walk-in for assistance. Bills can be paid by mail, online, in person, or by phone. A drop box is available at this location.
site_eligibility: Addresses with set boundaries in Crawford, Dubois, Harrison, Lawrence, and Orange counties.

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization focused on providing low cost medical care for the uninsured and underinsured.
service_description: Provides general health care for all ages. Services include physical exams, primary care, immunizations, obstetrics, and lab tests.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Open

service_description: Provides general health care for all ages. Services include physical exams, primary care, immunizations, obstetrics, and lab tests.

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that promotes abilities and provides opportunities for persons with disabilities or other barriers to fully participate in their community.
service_description: Provides transportation to residents of Orange County. Also provides Medicaid transportation.
site_details: Call at least 72 hours in advance to schedule transportation.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization community-based food pantry.
service_description: Provides perishable and nonperishable food to those in need. Open service area.
site_details: Drive through for service.
site_eligibility: Limit one visit every month

agency_desc: An elected official responsible for administering the township, including such duties as providing township assistance, burial of the indigent, and maintaining the township budget.
service_description: May be able to assist township residents who are experiencing an unexpected crisis with basic needs, such as:  Essential utilities -- Burial/Cremation expenses -- Housing expense -- Work/Medical transportation -- Food/Clothing -- Necessary medications/medical care assistance is at the discretion of the trustee. Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.

agency_desc: A church with worship services and charitable outreach, including a food pantry.
service_description: Provides perishable and nonperishable food to people in need. Limited service area.
site_details: Walk in.
site_schedule: Wed 9am-10:30am -- Last Wed of the month 5pm-6:30pm
site_eligibility: Living in Springs Valley School District

agency_desc: An Indiana Area Agency on Aging (Area 15), providing services to seniors and persons with disabilities in Crawford, Lawrence, Orange, and Washington County. Also serves as the areas Economic Development Corporation for Crawford, Daviess, Dubois, Greene, Lawrence, Martin, Orange, Pike and Washington County.
site_name: DOGWOOD SENIOR CITIZENS CENTER - ORANGE COUNTY MEAL SITE
service_description: Provides nutritious, sit-down lunch and fellowship every weekday for area seniors. Diabetic menu available. Reservations required at least 24 hours in advance. Small donation requested.
site_details: Call Hoosier Uplands at least 24 hours in advance for reservations.
site_eligibility: Persons age 60 or older

agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignments, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.
site_eligibility: Students living within the school district in grades K-12

agency_desc: The County Clerk maintains records of all civil and criminal court activities; administers jury draw, child support collections, and voter registration; issues marriage licenses; and records state tax liens.
service_description: Maintains records of all county-level court cases, and issues marriage licenses. Files petitions for divorce, probate, adoption, name change, child custody, parental visitation, record expungement, and protective orders. Processes payments for child support, foreclosures, court costs, and other judgments. Oversees elections in the county.
taxonomy_name: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
nameLevel4: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
site_details: Call or walk in for information.
site_schedule: Clerk's Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
site_eligibility: Varies by service; serves Orange County

agency_desc: Government agency that locates, identifies, and appraises all taxable property in Orange County.
service_description: Calculates the value of all taxable property in Orange County, which is then used to assess taxes. Hears appeals of assessments, oversees reassessments, and maintains information on boundaries and ownership.
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information.
site_eligibility: Varies by service; limited to taxable property in Orange County

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library for residents. Circulates books, eBooks, periodicals, audio books, CDs, and DVDs, Provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. -- Call for information.
site_schedule: Mon, Tues, and Fri 9am-5pm; Thurs 9am-6pm; Sat 9am-1pm
Mon, Tues, and Fri 9am-5pm; Thurs 9am-6pm; Sat 9am-1pm
Mon, Tues, and Fri 9am-5pm; Thurs 9am-6pm; Sat 9am-1pm
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library for residents of the town of Paoli and Paoli Township in Orange County. Circulates books, periodicals, audio books, CDs, and DVDs. Provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. -- Call for information.
site_schedule: Mon and Fri 11am-6pm; Tues and Thurs 11am-7pm; Sat 9am-1pm
Mon and Fri 11am-6pm; Tues and Thurs 11am-7pm; Sat 9am-1pm
site_eligibility: Most Library Services: Open -- Resident Library Card: Living in Paoli or Paoli Township in Orange County

agency_desc: Provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library for residents of Orleans, Orangeville, and Northeast Townships in Orange County. Circulates books, audio books, CDs, and DVDs. Provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. -- Call for information.
site_schedule: Mon and Tues 10am-5:30pm; Thurs and Fri 10am-5pm; Sat 9am-1pm
Mon and Tues 10am-5:30pm; Thurs and Fri 10am-5pm; Sat 9am-1pm
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a library card: Living in Orleans, Orangeville, or Northeast Township

agency_desc: County veterans service officers are veterans employed by the county to act as liaisons with county residents for veteran issues, including but not limited to; providing forms, information, and assistance in obtaining state and federal veterans benefits.
service_description: Provides information about and assistance with veterans' benefits to veterans, their surviving spouses, and their children. County service officers can assist in the completion and submission of forms necessary to receive all appropriate federal and state veterans' benefits.
site_details: Walk in or call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Veteran, surviving spouses or children of a veteran

agency_desc: The Orange County Surveyor's Office maintains land mapping and boundaries congruent with the best interests of the county and its citizens through section cornerstones, maintaining the county regulated drain system, field surveying as necessary.
service_description: Provides the following county services: maintains section corners; files legal surveys; maintains voter precinct maps, annexation, and de-annexation; investigates drainage obstructions; and researches and documents all cemeteries in Orange County.
nameLevel3: Land Use Planning and Regulation Bodies
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information.
site_eligibility: Open (limited to properties in Orange County)

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement services and maintains the correctional facility for Orange County.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime prevention, and criminal investigation services and administers county correctional facilities in Orange County. A ten-digit dispatch number is provided for nonemergency dispatch calls. For emergency assistance, persons should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency police, fire, or medical assistance. For nonemergency requests or reports, call the office during normal business hours. nonemergency dispatch number.
site_eligibility: Open; serves Orange County

agency_desc: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
service_description: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
site_details: Walk in for emergency care or call all for additional information.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Receives payment of property taxes.
service_description: Collects taxes and in the case of delinquent taxes may order the sale of real property to pay delinquent taxes. Receives distributions of local income and other taxes that are collected by the state such as real estate tax, personal property tax, mobile home tax, state assessed tax, and the following miscellaneous taxes: auto excise tax, inheritance tax, and innkeeper's tax.
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information.
site_eligibility: Open (limited to properties in Orange County)

agency_desc: Represents the state of Indiana in felony and misdemeanor criminal prosecutions, conducts criminal investigations, supervises Grand Jury proceedings, enforces child support orders, conducts juvenile adjudication and prosecution, enforces traffic violations, and provides information and assistance to victims of crime.
service_description: Files, modifies, and enforces court-ordered child support cases in Orange County.
site_details: To apply for child support or request child support enforcement or modification, call the prosecutor's office to schedule an appointment. -- For payment information, call the Indiana Kids Line.
site_schedule: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
site_eligibility: To File for Child Support Assistance: Living in Orange County -- Parent, guardian, aunt, uncle, or grandparent who has physical custody of a child (ages 0-18) -- Requiring financial support from a noncustodial parent of the child

agency_desc: A government agency that provides public health nursing, works to control the spread of communicable disease, investigates environmental hazards, and maintains vital records for the county.
service_description: Works to prevent or control the spread of communicable diseases in the County. Investigates reports of communicable diseases, provides community education programs, and offers public health nursing services.
site_details: Communicable disease investigations are generally referred through hospitals and clinics; call for additional information.
site_eligibility: Varies by service; call for details.

agency_desc: Provides electric service to customers.
service_description: Provides electric service to customers within a set service area in Crawford, Lawrence, Martin, Orange, and Washington counties.
site_details: Call or walk in for assistance; bill can be paid online, in person, by mail, or by phone; a drop box is available at this location.
site_schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 7am-4pm -- Outage Reporting: Daily 24 hours
site_eligibility: Addresses within set boundaries in Crawford, Lawrence, Martin, Orange, and Washington counties

agency_desc: Provides maintenance services on public roads and streets.
service_description: Maintains county roadways in Orange County, including patching, paving, snow removal, street sweeping, roadside mowing, and drainage along roadways.
site_details: Call for information or to report a problem. To report urgent problems after hours, call 9-1-1 or Orange County dispatch.
site_eligibility: Open (limited to county roads and properties in Orange County)

agency_desc: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Orange County.
service_description: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Orange County, including performing the following duties: Controls, maintains, and supervises county property -- Audits and authorizes claims against the county -- Receives bids for and authorizes county contracts -- Performs certain election functions -- Handles appeals of township trustee decisions
site_details: Call for assistance.
site_schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Board Meetings: Monthly 2nd and 4th Tues 9am
Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Board Meetings: Monthly 2nd and 4th Tues 9am
site_eligibility: Varies by service

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Provides probation services for the Orange County Circuit and Superior Courts, including supervising juvenile and adult offenders in the community and linking them with programs and services to support their rehabilitation.
site_details: Through the courts; call for information.
site_eligibility: Offenders assigned to probation by the Orange County Courts

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Oversees both criminal and civil trials, including juvenile and family cases, in Orange County.
site_details: Varies; cases are generally initiated through the prosecutor's office, private attorneys -- individuals representing themselves. For juror information, contact the court.
site_eligibility: Persons named in cases or called for jury duty at this court

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization offering supportive services to those dealing with substance abuse.
service_description: Provides support services and referrals to those dealing with substance abuse.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_details: Call or walk in for intake form.
site_eligibility: Age 18 or older -- Individuals struggling with substance use addiction-including family and friends
